name: battery-analytics-platform
description: Smartphone Battery & Usage Analytics Platform - Analyzing Android telemetry data from ~300 users
author: Battery Analytics Team

scripts.setup: bun run db:start && bun run db:init && bun run db:load
scripts.setup:grouped: bun run db:start && bun run db:init:grouped && bun run db:consolidate:grouped && bun run db:load:grouped
scripts.build: bun run build:server && bun run build:client
scripts.db:init: cd scripts && DB_PORT=5433 bun run init-schema.ts
scripts.db:init:grouped: cd scripts && DB_PORT=5433 DB_NAME=battery_analytics_grouped bun run init-schema.ts
scripts.db:load: cd scripts && DB_PORT=5433 bun run load-db.ts
scripts.db:load:grouped: cd scripts && DB_PORT=5433 bun run load-grouped-db.ts
scripts.lint: bun run lint:server && bun run lint:client
scripts.typecheck: bun run typecheck:server && bun run typecheck:client
